TopicTitle: cBBp SPC Pack v0.4: Fixed Failcan RCS and added some adapter pieces. Enjoy.

Articles.Content: Just increase all the values to something ridiculous, brute force helps always!

Just increase all the values to something ridiculous, brute force helps always!

6000000 does nothing. must be something with the colision meshes. I will have to investigate.

Welp. I am not sure why it does this. one little tap on the ground and they separate. Will just have to be put off till animations and landing gear come out perhaps. thoguh. that would not solve much in all honesty.
welp made a tiny Strut connector to link the two now they are super tough. :-\

All textured. time to balance it. i feel it has enough fuel for retro and landings (if you don\'t use the trunk)

Made all the textures myself. The Solar panel texture was modeled in CAD and then exported as image
This looks amazing, nice work.

This looks amazing, nice work.

Well thanks Mom didn\'t know you played. Also it looks better with out the suns bloom but yeah.

Well thanks Mom didn\'t know you played. Also it looks better with out the suns bloom but yeah.

do want

how long until release, maybe tomorrow?

do want

how long until release, maybe tomorrow?

tomorrow or friday. I need to balance it. the landing tanks are already balance. but rcs and trunk tanks are not balanced at all.
they look nice when you crash
At this point I\'m repeating myself, but again your level of detail is astounding. And looking forward to its release.

All textured. time to balance it. i feel it has enough fuel for retro and landings (if you don\'t use the trunk)

Made all the textures myself. The Solar panel texture was modeled in CAD and then exported as image

Are you doing the Solar Panels the same way the Noyuz guy did; using modified parachute textures?

the parachute is the only way you can do it at this point in time. it works well enough. just don\'t do a retro burn with the engines and it will never look off.

one last problem to figure out now that we can land with out bad stuff happening.

For some reason it ignores the 2nd stage RCS tank and directly uses the trunk tank @_@ but since Kraco RCS thursters use alot more this is a problem lol.

Well thanks Mom didn\'t know you played. Also it looks better with out the suns bloom but yeah.

Well if you mean i don\'t play KSP i do and its one of my most favorite games

and i been following your add on from the start and cant wait for you to release the new version. :thumbup:
> I have no idea why the rocket suddenly decided to start taking fuel from the trunk RCS tank before the second stage RCS tank but it did. I didn\'t even change anything. this is frustrating.
Does it rely on the order that the tanks are placed (i.e: Trunk tank is placed first, thus is used first)?

Does it rely on the order that the tanks are placed (i.e: Trunk tank is placed first, thus is used first)?

I thought it went from the 'bottom' tank first. Try taking out the trunk tank; see if it\'ll even use the fuel.

apparently it uses the top first in s stack. it has no correlation to the order of tanks in the side or the stages. it is sort of annoying actually. so i am moving the RCS tank to the top of the tank in the trunk. Tests show this works. It sort of sucks since the trunk RCS tank is rather detailed since it could be seen more than the inner Trunk Tanks. Oh well.
and apparently i am wrong it just wants to use that tanik no matter what i do :/

guess i will revert the changes. Give the trunk RCS tank :-\ the 2nd stages fuel and wait for this bug to be fixed. that way the trunks RCS tank being so large is semi explaine.d I dslike it. i dislike it alot but it seems to be the only way...

guess i will revert the changes. Give the trunk RCS tank :-\ the 2nd stages fuel and wait for this bug to be fixed. that way the trunks RCS tank being so large is semi explaine.d I dslike it. i dislike it alot but it seems to be the only way...

You could give us an experimental version, and let us help you figure it out. 8)
you will beable to hel figure it out tomorrow at some point perhaps. currently i have to go to work.

yeah. I made the .crafts for the release and tested some of them. I will be releasing tomorrow at some point. it all works on 13.0 umm. just have to get home from work and edit the file part text and stuff

if somene wants to help with release it would be awesome if someone could give me a template to make my first post for this thread prettier

I was playing with the half size version, the attachement nodes for the radial decouplers needs to be reworked, at least the one I downloaded has the tanks being attached off the ship. I\'d show you a picture except I\'m not on my gaming rig at the moment.

if somene wants to help with release it would be awesome if someone could give me a template to make my first post for this thread prettier

Send me some pictures, and I\'ll lend you a hand.
